descriptionHtml:
This is my attempt at making your bog-standard dragon look a bit more colourful.

Note: This will overwrite any other dragon skin mod you have set for standard dragons.

To spawn a dragon to have a closer look, open the console and enter: player.placeatme 1ca03


== To Install==

Unpack the zip to your skyrim directory

== To Uninstall ==

Browse to Data/textures/actors/dragon/

Then delete:

dragon.dds
dragonlod.dds

Job done!
author: Xentrix74
